trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the Rusted fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Rusted makes two Bite attacks.

action.name: Steam Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: {@actSave dex} {@dc 19}, each creature and flammable object that isn't being worn or carried in a 60-foot {@variantrule Cone [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Cone}. {@actSaveFail} 45 ({@damage 7d12}) Fire damage, and the target starts {@hazard burning|XPHB}. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only. {@actSaveSuccessOrFail} Being underwater doesn't grant {@variantrule Resistance|XPHB} to this Fire damage.
